licensing: Do not copy proprietary text; author original rationale.
privacy: Do not include secrets or personal data unless explicitly required.
safety: Do not overwrite existing DRR files.
Use the next available numeric prefix based on existing files.

acceptance_criteria: Creates a DRR markdown file in design/decisions/ with a numeric prefix.
The DRR includes Context, Decision, and Consequences sections.
If telemetry/log-work is present, a U.Work record is attempted.

input_fixture.context: We need a structured, machine-validated format for defining skills.
input_fixture.decision: Adopt SkillSpec v0.1.0 for all skill definitions and validate in CI.
input_fixture.title: Adopt SkillSpec v0.1.0

tests.name: basic-drr
tests.notes: Assumes an empty design/decisions directory so the next id is 001.

input_fixture.context: We need a clear separation between design-time docs and runtime outputs.
input_fixture.decision: Keep docs/specs under design/ and generated outputs under runtime/.
input_fixture.title: Separate design and runtime artifacts

tests.name: basic-drr-2
tests.notes: Assumes a single existing DRR so the next id is 002.

failure_modes: Failed to create or access design/decisions/.
Failed to determine the next DRR id.
Optional telemetry logging failed (telemetry/log-work unavailable or errored).

inputs.description: Optional work context used when logging U.Work.
inputs.name: work_context

intent.goal: Create a DRR markdown file that captures context, decision, and consequences.
non_goals: Does not make the decision; only records it.
Does not modify or overwrite existing DRRs.
Does not enforce decision content beyond the DRR structure.

name: Record DRR

outputs.description: Path to the generated DRR markdown file in design/decisions/.
outputs.name: drr_path

procedure.instruction: Validate required inputs: title, context, decision.
Resolve the design/decisions/ directory and create it if missing.
Determine the next numeric DRR id based on existing decisions files.
Construct the DRR content with Status, Context, Decision, and Consequences sections.
Write the DRR markdown file to design/decisions/.
If telemetry/log-work is available, log the DRR action with spec E.9.

summary: Records a formal Design-Rationale Record (DRR) for architectural decisions.
